mapper.select: SELECT bk.id,bk.book_name,bk.book_des,bk.img,bk.type,bk.status,bk.author_name,bk.author_des,bk.ebook_url,bk.ebook_pwd,bk.borrow_num,bk.creator,bk.updator,bk.created,bk.updated,bk.yn,bt.name FROM book bk LEFT JOIN book_type bt on bk.type = bt.type where bk.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( book_name, book_des, img, TYPE, kind, STATUS, author_name, author_des, ebook_url, ebook_pwd, borrow_num, creator, updator, created, updated, yn )VALUES( #{bookName}, #{bookDes}, #{img}, #{type}, #{kind}, #{status}, #{authorName}, #{authorDes}, #{ebookUrl}, #{ebookPwd}, #{borrowNum}, #{creator}, #{updator}, #{created}, #{updated}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT bk.id,bk.book_name,bk.book_des,bk.img,bk.type,bk.status,bk.author_name,bk.author_des,bk.ebook_url,bk.ebook_pwd,bk.borrow_num,bk.creator,bk.updator,bk.created,bk.updated,bk.yn FROM book bk where bk.type = #{type} limit 1
